sub_title: PHD Student at Theologische Universiteit Kampen Utrecht
summary:
Currently
Ph.D stududent, Researching Abraham Kuyper's participatory ideal and practice
Board Member of Asia Kuyper Institure

Writer of Non-profit Public-good Organization Centers(Seoul & Gyunggi)
Global Reporter of Educational Broadcast Center in Korea
Teacher of Korean School Rotterdam 



Living in Kampen, the Netherlands

I am a theologian, historian, journalist, and Korean language teacher. Writing and teaching are my daily works.
